Class SpellTargetsAdjacentAura

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.demilich.metastone.game.logic.CustomCloneable

        • net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.trigger.Enchantment

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Entity>, HasDesc<AuraDesc>, HasCard, Trigger
    public class SpellTargetsAdjacentAura
extends Aura
    When this aura is in play, spells with minion targets also target adjacent minions.
    See Also:
